name: Defeat the Autumn Spirit
description:
Use the arrow key or wasd to move 

Hold space bar to shoot.

Hold left shift to move slowly and show the hitbox.

Hold F to freeze your enemies and their bullet ( 10s max)

The game jam is finally over and our project is not really xD

The basic idea was to embody a spirit representing the winter which had to fight the spirits of the other seasons.

For the 10 seconds theme, we wanted to make mechanics on each spirits (own include) of 10 seconds duration.

But we aimed a little too high at the beginning and we ended up with only one boss (the spirit of autumn) and the theme is only used for the player's ability to freeze the enemy.

We hope that this prototype will be pleasant to play

We will finish the game in the next few weeks so don't hesitate to give your feedback!

All visual asset were made during the game jam, ( except the snowflake ).

We used  Vivaldi's Four Seasons: Autumn - Epic Trailer Version by L'Orchestra Cinématique, go checkout their patreon and youtube channel !
